metadataAttributes.Title: Finance for Technical Managers Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Launch your career in financial management. Master tools and techniques to perform a financial analysis.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Product Cost Analysis, Project valuation, financial statement analysis, Discounted Cash Flow Analysis, Financial Adviser, time value of money, Cost Estimation Techniques, Application to Personal Finances, Project Valuation: NPV IRR and Payback Period, Creating a Compelling Project Business Case, Project Selection Techniques, Risk Management: Scenario and Sensitivity Analysis,
